import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const AddCourse = () => { const [Data, setData] = useState({ Name: '', Level: '', Description: '' }) const [Image, setImage] = useState() const getData = (ev) => { let name = ev.target.name let value = ev.target.value setData({ ...Data, [name]: value }) } console.log(process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND) const submit = (ev) => { let val = new FormData() val.append('Name', Data.Name) val.append('Level', Data.Level) val.append('Description', Data.Description) val.append('Image', Image) axios.post(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND}/addcourse`, val).then(() => { alert("data added") }).catch((e) => { console.log(e) }) } return ( <>

ADD COURSE

{ setImage(ev.target.files[0]) }}>
) } export default AddCourse
